Sentencas: Electrolyte supports for SOFC applications were obtained by water-based tape-casting.
Titulo: Water-based tape-casting of SOFC composite 3YSZ/8YSZ electrolytes and ionic conductivity of their pellets

Sentencas: Slurries of commercial 3YSZ and 8YSZ and mixtures with a mass ratio of 25/75 and 75/25, respectively, were prepared.
Titulo: Water-based tape-casting of SOFC composite 3YSZ/8YSZ electrolytes and ionic conductivity of their pellets

Sentencas: A commercial acrylic polymer binder with dispersive properties was used.
Titulo: Water-based tape-casting of SOFC composite 3YSZ/8YSZ electrolytes and ionic conductivity of their pellets

Sentencas: The drying conditions for obtaining crack-free green tapes were studied.
Titulo: Water-based tape-casting of SOFC composite 3YSZ/8YSZ electrolytes and ionic conductivity of their pellets

Sentencas: Crack formation during drying was greatly affected by the carrier speed at a fixed temperature.
Titulo: Water-based tape-casting of SOFC composite 3YSZ/8YSZ electrolytes and ionic conductivity of their pellets

Sentencas: Thermal analysis was performed on the green tapes to study the binder burn out properties.
Titulo: Water-based tape-casting of SOFC composite 3YSZ/8YSZ electrolytes and ionic conductivity of their pellets

Sentencas: Weight loss of the green tapes occurred until 400 degrees C and a pre-heating step was therefore included in the sintering program.
Titulo: Water-based tape-casting of SOFC composite 3YSZ/8YSZ electrolytes and ionic conductivity of their pellets

Sentencas: The microstructure of the green and sintered tapes were investigated by SEM.
Titulo: Water-based tape-casting of SOFC composite 3YSZ/8YSZ electrolytes and ionic conductivity of their pellets

Sentencas: Fully densified tapes were obtained after sintering at 1450 degrees C.
Titulo: Water-based tape-casting of SOFC composite 3YSZ/8YSZ electrolytes and ionic conductivity of their pellets

Sentencas: The ionic conductivity of pressed pellets were characterized by impedance spectroscopy in the temperature range of 200-1000 degrees C. Phase and crystal structure of pressed pellets were analyzed by XRD.
Titulo: Water-based tape-casting of SOFC composite 3YSZ/8YSZ electrolytes and ionic conductivity of their pellets

Sentencas: The crystallinity varied from a majority of monoclinic structure (pure 3YSZ) to a majority of tetragonal structure with increasing the 8YSZ content.
Titulo: Water-based tape-casting of SOFC composite 3YSZ/8YSZ electrolytes and ionic conductivity of their pellets

Sentencas: A cubic single phase structure was obtained by further increasing the 8YSZ content.
Titulo: Water-based tape-casting of SOFC composite 3YSZ/8YSZ electrolytes and ionic conductivity of their pellets

Sentencas: It was shown that the ionic conductivity of the composite samples were modified with respect to the pure materials.
Titulo: Water-based tape-casting of SOFC composite 3YSZ/8YSZ electrolytes and ionic conductivity of their pellets

Sentencas: At high temperatures the pure cubic structure gave rise to high conductivity.
Titulo: Water-based tape-casting of SOFC composite 3YSZ/8YSZ electrolytes and ionic conductivity of their pellets

Sentencas: At low temperatures the conductivity was affected by the grain boundary resistance which was the lowest for the pure 3YSZ, the highest for the pure 8YSZ and decreased as a function of increasing 8YSZ content.
Titulo: Water-based tape-casting of SOFC composite 3YSZ/8YSZ electrolytes and ionic conductivity of their pellets
